knimeNode.name: CloSpan
knimeNode.shortDescription: Implementation of the CloSpan Algorithm for mining closed frequent sequential patterns

fullDescription.intro:
Implementation of the CloSpan Algorithm.
The input file format is defined as follows:
Each item from a sequence is a positive integer and items from the same itemset within a sequence are separated by single space.
Note that it is assumed that items within a same itemset are sorted according to a total order and that no item can appear twice in the same itemset.
The value "-1" indicates the end of an itemset. The value "-2" indicates the end of a sequence (it appears at the end of each String).
For further information see:
http://www.philippe-fournier-viger.com/spmf/index.php?link=documentation.php#exampleBIDE ,
http://www.philippe-fournier-viger.com/spmf/icde04_bide.pdf
fullDescription.option: The column which contains the sequence data (ensure the correct format)
"show sequences ids?" (true/false) This parameter allows to specify that sequence ids of sequences containing a pattern should be output for each pattern found.

ports.outPort: Output of patterns with corresponding support, followed by a column with the amount of items in the sequence. The last column could be activated, it prints out the corresponding sequence ids.
